tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My 5yr old son required filling of cavities of few of his milk teeth. It was first ever visit of dentist for my son. As a parent I was nervous and skeptical about how the evening appointment will turn into. Dr. Ajitha was calm and clearly explained what has happened and was talking baby steps in introducing the dentist chair to my son. She was talking to my son and explaining next steps and taking it slow so that he won't be scared in future visits. We had to do three visits and my son didn't complain of any pain after the filling and did not resist to visit the clinic, that is a huge relief to me as a parent. The clinic is tidy with waiting area and staff are taking your appointment prior through phone call. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you for the your valuable feedback sir

review: I took my mother for a major treatment at quantum dental clinic. My mother & me are very happy and satisfied with the treatment received.   Dr. Ajitha Sureshkumar is kind & very experience doctor who can handle the elderly patients in a caring manner, my mother’s fear disappeared when we visited The clinic at the first visit itself , because the way Dr explained about the treatment was excellent, clinic is very neat & tidy, Latest technologies are being used with the affordable cost.After seeing the clinic set up, Initially we thought that the charges will be very high. But with my previous experience ,I would say that the treatment charges are very very nominal & the quality of treatment is excellent in this clinic.Assistant doctor is also well experienced.Thank you Dr.Ajitha ma’am *** *** ********* ********** my mother is very happy now.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir

review: I feel Quantum dental clinic is a one stop solution for dental treatment. Clinic is equipped with latest technology, higenic and Dr. Ajitha is very friendly,competent with more experience. Highly qualified Consultants and Assistant doctors are employed. Treatment charges are affordable and very less compare to other clinics. Our family is fully satisfied withe treatment and we feel this clinic will be our family dentistree spot.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir

review: Dr.Ajitha sureshkumar is a proficient dentist.Treatment planning & treatment is excellent.Clinic is pleasant & hygienic.Doctor is very caring & friendly.Post treatment follow up through phone was given by the doctors , hence I could clarify my doubts what I missed out to ask during the clinic visit. We are very much satisfied with the clinic and treatment.
